meanings.definition: Relating to or belonging to the mosquito genus Aedes.
meanings.sent1: The aedine mosquitoes are known for carrying diseases.
meanings.sent2: The aedine species can be found in tropical regions.
meanings.sent3: The aedine insects decided to throw a party in the stagnant water.
meanings.sent4: The aedine characteristics of the mosquito make it a formidable carrier of illnesses.
meanings.sent5: The aedine nature of these mosquitoes makes them a significant health concern.

meanings.definition: Any mosquito of the genus Aedes.
meanings.sent1: An aedine was buzzing around the room, causing annoyance.
meanings.sent2: The aedine bit me while I was outside.
meanings.sent3: The aedine seemed to have a preference for ankles.
meanings.sent4: The aedine, a tiny but mighty creature, can transmit diseases.
meanings.sent5: I could hear the aedine's buzzing as it approached.
